questions.quote: I told Elaine about an apartment opening up in my building. She's going to move in.
Well, I'll tell you, she would have to be really vibrant. So vibrant, she'd be spinning.
I'm just waiting for a lift back to the island, he won't be ready until eleven, so I figured I'd give you a break.  I thought I'd see what it was like to hang out with someone in show business.
I believe the doors on the bathroom stalls, here at the stadium, don't offer much by way of privacy. But I was thinking if we extend the doors all the way to the floors......
Right. He cooks my food, he cleans my house, he does all my shopping for me. And there you go, that's your program.
I think this is the same one I gave him.  He recycled this gift.  He's a regifter!
It's a, it's a stony mineral concretion, formed abnormally in the kidney. And this jagged shard of calcium pushes its way through the ureter into the bladder. It's forced out through the urine!
You already have an in. You have the same first name!...  'Jerry'!
Oh, thanks.  That's no signal, who wouldn't like me in this leotard? I look amazing in this leotard.
You know, I could probably shoot him from here. I'd be doing us both a favor.
